tool_description: Validates compatibility between selected fixtures, finishes, and materials to ensure proper function, aesthetics, and longevity.

fixture_materials.description: Fixture materials: ceramic, porcelain, acrylic, fiberglass, etc.

finish_types.description: Finish materials: chrome, brushed-nickel, oil-rubbed-bronze, etc.

wall_materials.description: Wall finish materials: tile, paint, wallpaper, stone, etc.

flooring_type.description: Flooring material: ceramic-tile, vinyl, natural-stone, or laminate

error_messages: Unrecognized fixture material: Use standard bathroom fixture materials.
Invalid finish type: Specify recognized metal finishes or surface treatments.
Incompatible wall material: Selected wall material not suitable for bathroom moisture conditions.
Invalid flooring type: Use ceramic-tile, vinyl, natural-stone, or laminate.
Material compatibility conflict: Some selected materials are not compatible with each other.
usage: Specify all fixture materials, finish types, wall materials, and flooring. The tool analyzes compatibility and identifies potential issues or optimal combinations.

material_recommendations.description: Suggested material substitutions for better compatibility
